articles.author: International New York Times
articles.title: American company's moon lander disintegrates in Earth's atmosphere - Deccan Herald
articles.description: American Company's Moon Lander Disintegrates in Earth's Atmosphere
articles.content: Astrobotic initially estimated that Peregrine would run out of propellant and die within a couple of days. But as the leak slowed, the spacecraft continued to operate. All 10 of the powered payloads,… [+355 chars]
